Projects.name: Wave Simulation
Projects.description: A ocean wave simulation created using p5.Js. Done by manipulating frequency & amplitude of sin(x).

Projects.name: Spotify Playlist Search
Projects.description: A playlist searching app that leverages spotify api to go through a users playlist and find which ones contain a given song. Implemented in Python3 and uses tkinter for Graphics.

Projects.name: AI Trainer
Projects.description: Capstone Project made in Unreal. Responsible for scene lighting, healthbar, weapon and drop mechanics. Led a team of 3 in a SCRUM environment to meet deadlines and update our Project Manager.

Projects.name: Memory Game
Projects.description: Card game made in React as part of The Odin Project's Web Development course. Uses local-storage to keep players high-score.
